about_the_game:
Get the super cute hand drawn art used for '101 Cute Dogs: Find & Paint' in 8k resolution, ready to print, use it as wallpaper or in any other way you want.

Just access the game installation folder, find the 'Artbook' folder, and enjoy!
detailed_description:
Get the super cute hand drawn art used for '101 Cute Dogs: Find & Paint' in 8k resolution, ready to print, use it as wallpaper or in any other way you want.

Just access the game installation folder, find the 'Artbook' folder, and enjoy!
